assignments.description: This assignment allows for the screen's default values to be set to the scrVar variables. Needed in case control returns to the screen after failing validation.
assignments.name: Assignment001_Initialize_screen_values
assignments.label: Assignment001 Initialize screen values

assignments.description: Save the values from the screen in variables so they can be restored if validation fails and control returns to the screen
assignments.name: Assignment002_Save_screen_values
assignments.label: Assignment002 Save screen values and reset error flag

assignments.description: Assign values from screen to object to pass to subflow
assignments.name: Assignment010_Person_Account_Fields
assignments.label: Assignment010 Person Account Fields

decisions.description: There is a required property on the Address field but could not enforce it programmatically so this Decision serves that purpose
decisions.name: Decision007_Address_is_populated
decisions.label: Decision007 Address is populated

decisions.description: One of the 3 phone numbers is a required field (home, mobile, work)
decisions.name: Decision008_At_least_one_phone_number
decisions.label: Decision008 At least one phone number

Flow.description: This screen flow is passed some consumer information and the PersonAccount fields are displayed for edit. After validation, the ALF is called to perform the create/update.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Gender choice set pulled from Account
dynamicChoiceSets.name: csGender

formulas.description: convert string of digits into xxx-xxx-xxxx
formulas.name: formatHomePhoneNumber

formulas.description: remove spaces, dashes and parentheses from phone number
formulas.name: removeNonNumericsFromHomePhone

formulas.description: validate that at least one of the phone number fields is populated
formulas.name: validateAtLeastOnePhone
validateHomePhone

Flow.label: ILH: Create-Update Person Account ScrF

screens.description: launched when CPS is missing info
screens.name: Screen010_Person_Account_Entry
screens.label: Screen010 Person Account Entry

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter consumer's phone number in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
Please enter consumer's phone number in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.
Please enter consumer's phone number in the format xxx-xxx-xxxx.

fields.name: errorMsg_AtLeastOnePhoneNumberIsRequired
fields.fieldText: At least one phone number is required.

subflows.description: calls autolaunched flow to perform insert/update logic
subflows.name: CreateUpdatePersonAccount_ALF
subflows.label: Create-Update Person Account ALF

variables.description: Flag set to false if validation fails and control returns to screen
variables.name: bln_ScreenIsValid

variables.description: Store the value of the Account ID which was created in the subflow
variables.name: outputTxt_AccountId

variables.description: Variable to save the BirthDate value from the screen
variables.name: scrVar_BirthDate
